website_summaries.verdict: A flash drive with fast speed and the ability to transfer a lot of data at once.
pros: Can transfer up to 4 GB of data
Durable and able to hold up to 128 GB total
cons: Only works with app, but it is included

customer_reviews.title: > > >  Fast and Compact 128GB Flash Drive for iPhone/iPads
customer_reviews.text: This Flash drive is as easy to use as it gets, with ample space for backup of your iPhone/iPad content. 1 - Very small and easy to carry 2 - Fast data transfer 3 - Out of the box you get 117GB free 4 - Has both lightening and USB plugs, great for easy transfer to Mac/Laptops Overall a really handy backup device. If you found this review helpful, please click below. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Time

customer_reviews.title: Handy little flash drive
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying HooToo 128G iphone flash drive. The first time I bought it for my moms ipad. I have to say this flash drive helps extend your devices storage capacity. It works flawlessly with the app and I had no issues with saving or finding my photos on it. All it takes is a simple plug in to your phone and you ready to save,delete or move documents around.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This device worked instantly and exactly as advertised. I cannot understand the negative reviews, possibly "operator error"? In any event, I would highly recommend this drive. The only very, very, minor problem is that, even with the extended tip, the device would not plug in to my phone with the case attached. My primary use is with ipads and occasionally with my iphone. I have no problem puling the cover back at the bottom to insert the device. Please don't listen to these "nay-sayers", I'm no whiz at computer equipment and am an older user (71) and I can even easily use this.
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: Under IOS 11 this memory no longer works for me ...
customer_reviews.text: Under IOS 11 this memory no longer works for me on IPhone X anymore. I can no longer use this memory. What a bummer! I contacted support but they couldn’t do anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Solid well-built, versatile and easy-to-use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-built device that exceeded my expectations. My wife's iPhone storage was used up and this flash drive makes it so easy to transfer her files off of her phone. I love that it has both the lightning connector and a USB connector. It is professionally packaged and has a solid feel to it. I wish I had bought one of these a long time ago because it's so much easier for transferring files off of your iPhone as opposed to using iCloud or other methods. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: 21st Century Computers

customer_reviews.title: Software Problem
customer_reviews.text: This flash drive worked well for about a year, during which time it was only used about 6 times, but for the past week or so it has stoped working. When I connect it appears to connect and shows a “loading” graphic, but it never loads. The graphic just keeps repeating. I can’t use it at all. I have updated the app but there seems to be a compatibility issue now.
customer_reviews.author: Addictazon...help!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. one of Best products bought to go with my ipad & iphone. Allows me instant movies on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, great for expanding memory for iPad. Requires a one time "iplugmate" Hoo Too software app, then it becomes plug in play. Once you install the app it seamlessly organizes items by photo,videos (this is where my movies,tv shows,home videos are stored) ,music,backup, file/folder, camera. I love being able carry more photos,movies while I travel and documents of reservations, emergency contacts, address book etc. Has a cover for lightening end, and could hang from a keychain. If I carried secure data, I would likely not put on my keychain for fear ring breaking or losing keys. Considering buying another or for gifts. This brand is Apple certified and works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Mcymse

customer_reviews.title: Bought the product so that I can back up my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product so that I can back up my Pictures during my trip / travel . The product doesnt work .I connected the flash drive to my Iphone and it doesnt transfer any pictures . Spoke to Amazon customer service and Sun valley tech folks.They are rude and doesnt help me out. Now I a have to travel without any back up drive. DONT BUY THIS ITEM
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: External Storage
customer_reviews.text: A great device to add external storage to your IOS device. I tested with my IPAD running 13.3.1. It was Plug'n'Play once you install the HooToo app. The system immediately recognized the external storage. I tested loading pictures and it worked flawlessly. The device has two ends, one for the IOS device and the other USB which allows for fast transfer of data between an IOS device and a PC or Mac, What an easy way to extend the storage on an IOS device, The build quality was good (made from aluminum) and it was relatively easy to plug into charging port on IPAD
customer_reviews.author: Bob N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Expansion of Storage for Apple devices!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly amazing! I got the 256GB version for a pretty cheap price here! The form size is incredibly good looking and pretty small to carry around on you. Also has a ring that can be attached to your keys. The best thing about this is the lightning connection, which truly expands the storage of your Apple device. And the lightning connector is covered to ensure its not physically affected. Connecting this on my computer gave me pretty good write speeds, although its not equivalent to an external USB 3.0 hard drive that I have. Tried playing stuff on my iPad using iPlugMate app and it works beautifully... This is a marvel!
customer_reviews.author: V2Sri

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. App install and all. Not too heavy, not too lite. Amazed at quality
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flash driver to easily transfer my data from my iphone to my computer, but it doesn't work on my computer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You have to decrypt the flash drive every time you connect to a computer.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product without any issues whatsoever. Although, I wish you didn’t have to decrypt it every time you want to see or add files from your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful. This drive may unknowingly convert all your files to HEIC file type. I’m trying to share files with my brother, and thought I would be giving him JPG (JPEG) files. Unbeknownst to me the HooToo converted all my files (Including) the files on my iPhone to HEIC. My brother is not PC literate, and making changes to his home desktop (To accept HEIC file types) is not what I wanted to do. According to HooToo documentation, HEIC is not even a file type supported! i am returning this device that has a mind of its own. Customer service was not very helpful, and after a second question, they have not responded!
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great little gadget, fast enough, the only problem I see down the road is that it my be useless if all new and upcoming Apple products will have new jacks.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bonas

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't transfer files
customer_reviews.text: Despite several attempts, I couldn't get more than 6 files to transfer to the storage device. I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: GKS

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Copy Large Files
customer_reviews.text: What good is a large capacity thumb drive that won’t copy large files? The real problem is the app associated with the drive. It can only read the drive when formatted in FAT32, which limits the file transfer size. The drive can be reformatted to NTFS, which will allow larger files, but then the app (which enables the drive to communicate with a mobile device such as an iPhone) will not recognize the drive. Fix your app, please!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven S. Billings

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as expected First time
customer_reviews.text: First one did not work as I expected. Customer service was outstanding with issuing a replacement and it's working great. I like the ability to select what I want to download or you can just select all. I did download the app to my devices before beginning. It would be helpful to include instructions with the flash drive. Very nicely packed and designed physically.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of pictures and videos on my IPhone. I didn't know how many. I realized that if I lost my phone or it was damaged I would loose these and that they were irreplaceable. i read the reviews and this devise had the best reviews. I downloaded the app, something I had not done before, but it was simple. I then plugged the drive in and just pressed that I wanted to back-up photos and the device took over. I downloaded 943 pictures and 43 videos in about ten minutes. I then could look at them on my laptop. I like the look of the drive too. Not cheap looking. So simple.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient to backup an transfer files between iPhone and flash drive
customer_reviews.text: It fully supports my iPhone X on iOS 11.3. When you plug into iPhone , it will ask you to download its app in order to transfer files through iOS. As you open the app, it shows many functions such as photos, videos, music, files, backup and camera. any type of files can be transferred. If your iPhone doesn't have enough storage, this is a good choice to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Li Chen Lin

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE 5/8: Vendor refunded moneyAbsolute rubbish- not 128 either
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 5/8/20: The vendor did agree to refund my purchase so raising rating per vendor request. Absolute crap! Ive tried to use this several times, read the guide over and over and cant see my photos on the iphone. I keep getting a SYSTEM message popping up. Ive checked all my settings-everything is set to share and still no photos show up Piece of crap-THIS WAS SUPPOSED TO BE EASY Updated review: i checked the app again and noticed right after i inserted the device it already had 4gb used...no transfers made, how has 4GB been used already. Dont trust this!!!
customer_reviews.author: dugger

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get app in the US that runs the USB
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my iPhone 7 Plus and when I plugged it in says app don’t exist in my country which is the US so the USB is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Expected more backup power.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Tao Tronics reimbursed me for 100% of what I purchased. They are awesome!! Thank you for your great customer service and satisfaction. Old Review: "It has a "backup" icon. You would think it would "backup" everything like your text messages, and other stuff, but the icon is only used to backup what you can do manually; your videos, pictures, and contacts....meh. I had to reset my phone, and did it trusting that ALL my stuff was backed up. Came to find out that only my pictures, videos, and contacts were backed up. I expected it to backup even my text messages :(."
customer_reviews.author: Mizz Artzy Pantz

customer_reviews.title: Review Update
customer_reviews.text: Review Update: Although I’ve had difficulties with this, the customer service is outstanding! I hope to be able to update this item with a 5-star review in a couple of months. Original Review: 2nd One Stopped Working: (1-Star) This one took longer to malfunction than the first one I bought but had the same exact problem of no longer showing up on my devices. I’m really disappointed because it worked so well for a month or so. I transfer a lot of videos with it and it seems it’s not up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy N.

customer_reviews.title: so far it is useless in my drawer until I have time to figure ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to get the app to work for this... so far it is useless in my drawer until I have time to figure it out...
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but iPlugmate could (should) be better.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this type of USB drives from several suppliers. After careful assessment/testing of software capabilities on handing data files, I chose HooToo as my top choice, even though it is slightly more expensive. (Other suppliers software handle pictures OK, but in general, having GREAT difficulties in managing other data files.). With iPlugmate there is still a software defect on handling tif files for pictures. (They don’t show up at all, although tif is included in product spec.) Also, there is a potential improvement to become more user friendly. (One of the other suppliers app has this feature) If the software can unzip files in situ ( not have to transfer the file to other apps for unzipping).
customer_reviews.author: J   S  Huang

customer_reviews.title: Work as Described
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought. It works exactly as describe. This is is VERY important. Based on the review, some user claim that it does not work, especially the other similar product. The built-in player palys different video format very well with ipad with IOS 13.X.X iPlugnate works as it claimed. The only complain is the file transfer from PC to ipad. It is not the Hootoo's fault, but the fault of ISO. Download directory with different type of file to Hootoo is not a proble. But down load from Hootoo to ipasd has to be done one file at a time. and the original directory will become non-exist in the ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Frog in Well

customer_reviews.title: Fast and convenient. Must have for working on iPad.
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget solves the biggest issue I have with iPad. For some reason, Apple makes it very difficult to transfer data off from iPad. I have to go through hoops to access some files. Apple products are great if you have 'everything from Apple' ecosystem, but it can be a nightmare otherwise. With this flash drive, I can quickly copy documents from my iPad without using a cable or iCloud setup. It's lifesaver when you're trying to do a presentation, but no one uses Mac. Speed is great, app works fine, and I love the metal design. It's a solid A+ from me.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Cheap,  difficult to use, did not backup all photos
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the HooToo as a gift for my wife, who asked me for a device to back up photos on her iPhone. The HooToo app seems like it was designed for an IT professional rather than a consumer. It is difficult to tell exactly what is is doing and it does not have an easy to use interface. Images get displayed in a list of thumbnails. Not very useful if you have thousands of images. You can’t use other applications to view the stored images. It also did not back up photos earlier than 2014 for some reason. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, awesome, awesome! If you’re looking for a way to transfer your phone pictures to your computer without any problems— you need this device! Just upload the app... upload the pictures... plug into your computer... and upload to your computer! VERY easy! You save storage on your phone and your memories. I always delete on my phone and the flash drive to redo the process again each year. Ya gotta get one of these! Apple has made it very hard to upload your photos to your computer- plus you don’t have to pay those expensive monthly storage fees on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Henry

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 30 days, got replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is the second hoo too flash drive I have purchased The first lasted 3 years, the iPhone lighting plug stopped working, the usb portion still functions. This device lasted only 30 days, and stopped working all together after I tried to transfer large back up file. I decided against returning it to amazon, since I could not clean files from the drive. I wish it would last more then 30 days. The app allows viewing dwg files on the iPhone among many other file types. After contacting the company they mailed new replacement drive to me. Very good customer service. I hope this one lasts Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sergei

customer_reviews.title: It's not what they advertise. You need a third ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not what they advertise. You need a third party app to download to your iPhone/iPad, if you don't have any left space on it the flash drive won't work without the app. Their advertise is that you just need to plug into your device and it will work magic. NO, it won't do it. My phone is full, after downloading the app and backing up my phone I still can't do pictures, unless I delate some from my phone then I'm able to do them again. So no, this is not what they catch me for, unfortunately. People, read revious.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Incredible and economic way to expand iPhone storage capacity
customer_reviews.text: This is incredible. Now I can use my iPhone to capture more memorable moment without worrying internal storage capacity. I use my iPhone to vlog all 4K videos. Very easy to transfer videos, images and files from iPhone to this flash drive. You just need to install iPlugmate app. It can also add extra security to protect your files in the flash drive by using a password. Transferring files to Windows or MAC can be done easily. Every one knows Apple try to sell you larger capacity iPhone with more money out of you pocket. However, with small amount of money, it solves BIG problem for me. Simple process, simple gadget, any tech novice can do this easily.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with Windows PCs!
customer_reviews.text: The description fails to mention this item doesn’t work with PCs, only iOS and MacBook. Kind of stupid to make a thumb drive when iOS does everything via Bluetooth. Beware if you’re trying to bypass iTunes or have an issue transferring pictures from you iPhone to your pc.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it doesn’t work correctly
customer_reviews.text: I can’t seem to get this to work, it took 175 photos from my iPhone. I still have many more, it doesn’t do anymore. Very disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: This WORKS Fast for both Mac and PC!
customer_reviews.text: This iPhone flash drive has been a Godsend! My daughter is going through a bumpy divorce and her soon-to-be-ex had her phone turned off without any notice. This left her with thousands of photos of her children all the way back to their births stranded on her deactivated phone. This flash drive has worked great and fast in transferring all her photos and videos so that they can be saved. She was especially happy that it works with both her Mac laptop and PC desktop! So now she has copies of all her photos and videos - as well as a mobile backup. It’s got plenty of storage, speed and even looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Scrappypattyanne

customer_reviews.title: Fast, handy, fantastic value!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic device, simple fast backup and transfer from my iPhone 11 Pro Max to my laptop (and Vice versa)! So much easier that using clunky iTunes (and Image Capture which doesn’t seem to work anymore). The app (free) is simple to use and fast. I like the quality build of the device as well, it’s all metal casing is far more robust than the usual plastic. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: P. D. Schaffner

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like my iPhone X but I dislike what a pain it is to transfer photos from it to my Windows based PC. This flash drive from HooToo was so easy to figure out and it was pretty quick too. There are only two things I don’t like about this product: • The lightning piece isn’t long enough to work with my Otterbox Defender case on. • Also, since my phone’s camera was set up to use the HEIC format, the HooToo won’t work for images in that format. The product description does not state that it supports the HEIC format, so that wasn’t unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wieber

customer_reviews.title: Product & trial time inadequate for inexperience user. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.text: Since I can’t return this, I will voice my opinion on your return policy of these items. I am not technologically savvy and can’t always find someone who is to help me. When I found someone, it was August 15th. I received the product on August 9th. It was ordered July 19 th. Since then, I have tried and tried to use this device on my iPhone and iPad. Not easy to do and doesn’t always connect to my Apple devices. Therefore, with less time to try, I would never recommend this product, nor this company, as well as, others. Mainly due to lack of time to see if product is satisfactory. Don’t waste your money on this Amazon product.
customer_reviews.author: A retired school Librarian

customer_reviews.title: No more Cloud storage monthly charges or out of memory
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have a 64 gb Iphone and I always have it full at 58GB. I recently heard about these flash drives which facilitate backing up Iphone data without the hassle of using itunes and a computer. The app is easy to use and shows me my data better than my iphone :) The only thing that I would like to improve is the option to cut and paste my content so that I do not have to go back to my phone to delete it. But love it otherwise, saves me time and money. The good thing is it works with multiple Iphones, so double the money saved. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Saurav

customer_reviews.title: Challenging to use.
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t know about it’s storage capacity. I’ve been trying to download the music from my iPhone, but it downloads things I’ve unselected. Then, I’ve tried 3 times to download photos from my phone and nothing is transferring. It works on it forever (for only 200 pictures) and took so long. When I went to check, it says my photo file on the flash drive contains no photos. It, again, would not recognize the photos I wanted to download. It was like it was all or nothing. I’m not very tech savvy but come on. It should be much easier to use than this. I would not recommend it unless they will provide better instructions. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KaelaG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this some time ago. I wanted it to view photos and videos transferred from my pc and Mac to view only on my iPad. I did not care to transfer from the iPad to the flash drive but you can. The required iplugmate app did not change from portrait view to landscape view on my iPad 6th gen. So I threw it in a draw. I recently tried it again and still no good but this time I decided to ask support for help. They were very responsive and acknowledged the problem and upgraded the app to work perfectly. Thank you HooToo support.
customer_reviews.author: LEJ

customer_reviews.title: Adding secure, easily-available storage has never been easier without paying for extra storage.
customer_reviews.text: It has excellent security measures including Touch ID. Because of its well thought-out design, there’s no need to concern myself about how thick or bulky my case is before I make a change due to the length of the iPhone connector and it’s very compact and nicely designed. It is very fast & allows me to add more tunes and videos. I made a music library of my personal CD collection. My husband is pleased with the quality. Also, I can move files & photos easily to allow more room in my phone’s available storage capacity. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great way to increase storage
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd HooToo drive we have bought. Easiest way to back up a phone or iPad plus load many movies to enjoy when traveling. I've had the first one over 5 or 6 years and have not had any issues. The same for the other two. Easy to use and takes up little room when taking on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to store photos
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to use, just download the iPlugmate app, follow the instructions, and copy your photos from your iPhone or iPad. Then, just insert the HooToo flash drive into another device to view your pictures. I use this for storing my numerous pictures from my iPhone since my iCloud storage is full. Nice solution for extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan88

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working, cannot reformat.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within a week of having it. I lost all the valuable assets for a project that I was transferring between my iPhone and iPad. It will no longer be read. Oddly enough you cannot even reformat it to assure nothing is on the device now. The “format” button on the app isn’t working. Due to the nature of what was on the device I wanted to reformat it before returning it to assure none of the information was breached. Again, not possible. Would not suggest purchasing this device. BEWARE! It seems like a way for them to get data from people with returns.
customer_reviews.author: Llama

customer_reviews.title: For quick easy transfer
customer_reviews.text: I honest have never used any type of picture keeper product. This product was easy to use with my phone and easy to use with my laptop. You do have an extra app that is loaded to your phone. I was a little skeptical of that but it was an easy delete when I was done in use. For reference I had and iPhone 7 and I was able to easily read transfer 5k photos from my photo my laptop and the to a external hard drive. I would not recommend long term storage on this item but o was surprise at how substantial it feels in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: C&A Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Big save!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!Im never know has that kind the stuff call iPhone flash drive until my friend told me that! this is super convenient and save money! is so easy install app call "ipugmate",All you need to do is plugs in to your iPhone then you can back up all the file you need!they have 7 type file you can back up like:photos/videos/music/file/folder/and back up contacts! the memory up to 128 gb Equate a iPhone and more! save your money save your iPhone storage!!! easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Sam.W

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t save all formats.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep European vacation pix safe (don’t trust Apple cloud because it seems to delete things from time to time in some baffling Apple way. Drive saved photos, was reasonably easy to figure out (instructions are minimal, but that’s not a surprise anymore). BUT if you shoot RAW DONT BOTHER. DOES NOT SAVE RAW FORMAT. Customer service is quick to respond...For most iOS users RAW formatting is a non-issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jumpin’Jacks

customer_reviews.title: It’s a relief to find this device!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a device to put my pictures from my iPhone on. I searched reviews and this was the one I ended up purchasing. I’m happy with my purchase! I have not finished putting all my pictures on there yet (because I have 19,000) but so far I am very pleased with how easy it is to use! I had to download the plugmate app but then all you do is back them up. You have the option to delete the pictures from your phone to free up space but you don’t have to.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Haynie

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills a needed iPhone shortcoming
customer_reviews.text: I researched many devices similar to this model, but most had dismal reviews. I needed an easy way to move photos from my iPhone to my PC, and this fits the bill. The storage capacity is impressive, the speed is fine, and the quality seems to be very good. As other reviewers have stated, it is not intuitive to use, and software features on the app are lacking, but there are few options out there to do what this device does. Price was fair, and so far it meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Kingdon

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone Flash Drive
customer_reviews.text: This flash drive is very deserving of being a top notch product. Easy to use and I found working with files and the backup to be very easy and it worked perfectly. The small size makes it easy to carry around. You will need to download the app called iplugmate from Apple store. Once installed and open, you can plug this drive in and you will have the ability to move files between phone and drive and even do a complete backup. I am very happy with this product. Everything is good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Revised: Outstanding customer service, works great in iPhone XR and iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: The company reached out to me when my first one didn't work properly and offered to replace it (after I'd already returned it). New version works flawlessly on both my iPhone XR (IOS 13) and my iPad Pro (iPad OS 13). Works nicely with new file system. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: William Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Long Hauls...
customer_reviews.text: If you travel to places like Singapore ( 16 hrs) and have seen everything on the screen, this is a great buy to carry along loaded with whatever you want or need to watch. The cover is a great addition. The last one (not from this company) I had had no cover and affected the quality of the product. In addition, I will say that the customer service I have experienced from this company, naming from a person named Belinda, has been exemplary. In fact if I had a customer service position, I would try to steal her away at whatever the cost. Thank you, not only for a great product, but for amazing staff. Kathie
customer_reviews.author: thorsten

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This flash drive is amazing is all I can say. Easy to use (app pop up right when you plug in the flash drive to your iphone). I love taking pictures and 256gb on my iPhone 11 Pro Max is never enough. What best is I can copy(transfer) pictures from anyone, anywhere, anytime without needing to have a computer to sync (annoying). It fit onto my phone perfectly with a bulky case (child proof case). I attach it my keys and such a sleek key chain. I wish it come in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Diorkoo

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, easy to use, clever design
customer_reviews.text: Resembles a standard USB 3 flash drive, w. an extra Lightning connector on the other end (covered when not in use w. a securely attached cap). All aluminum design is sturdy, compact, and feels substantive but also nice and compact. Plugs in well to iPhones/iPads, stays connected well. Speed is good as formatted -- considering it's a 128GB drive; subjectively it's faster on reads than writes. Partitioning w. DiskUtility might improve performance further, if user prefers.
customer_reviews.author: hippocampus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and portable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of technology. Using this you are able to transfer documents from your phone to your computer and vice versa. For the most part it’s also easy to email items from one place to the other or place in a cloud but this is nice for when that is not possible or when you don’t want to pay for cloud services. It’s very easy to use and works seamlessly. It’s also an easy item to attach to keychain and keep with you.
customer_reviews.author: Orinda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone stopped communicating with my computer (pretty sure computer issue) , couldn't download any picks that I had taken. Phone downloads quickly into Flash Drive, then computer has no issues downloading off of it. This kept me from forking out money for new desk top. I would also recommend this for anyone taking a trip and planning on taking tons pf pictures, load onto the Flash Drive to free up space on iPhone. Works quick and easy
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Need better instruction how to use it
customer_reviews.text: After I used at my phone didn't get nothing , I used in my laptop then I get some info. I didn't get any good result .it's not portable 100% it should work fast . hope they make as touch as possible to start copying , I had an experience to download fast , I had one since first arrive in the market , still selling in Amazon and it's not that great either . The Item was returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: desert stars

customer_reviews.title: Doubled the storage of my phone!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I just recently heard about it and ordered it right away, I do not regret it! It is super easy to use and I can save all the pictures from my phone that I don’t want to loose but they just taking so much space! I 100% recommend this product. You download the app and is easy to select all the pictures to copy/paste to your flash drive. You can easily make folders and keep your pictures organized.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria ramos

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful thing, it is very small and light so you can bring it with you all the time. My phone storage was full, I saved around 1000 pictures on this flash drive and I deleted them from my phone, finally, my phone is breathing after many pictures. And my flash drive still having space to save more pics later. I can use it on my phone and my laptop. Very good for the price and I like the color. It was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Storage Capacity
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to be able to easily transfer photos from my iphone to my windows laptop. As I use the device more, I imagine I will be exploring it's other uses. Works as described and is fairly easy to use for someone who is NOT techno savvy. The only thing I would like differently is that the written instructions that come with the device were a bit more complete. Can't beat the function and quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: Transfers files well. Records video poorly.
customer_reviews.text: The flash drive does not fit the iPhone 5s with an Otterbox. The case must be removed each time, which is inconvenient. I would rather invest and buy a camera. I recorded directly to the flash drive because I had run out of memory on my device, which was a bad idea. The video quality was reduced to 480 rather than 1080 resolution, and everything was backwards on the front facing camera. Recording with the front camera on the Apple Camera app automatically flips images and videos, this flashdrive's software should allow that feature, too. This device is best for transferring massive amounts of files from an iPhone, not directly recording to the flash drive.
customer_reviews.author: COA×4Top Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: decent product if you don't need to transfer large files.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to view movies on my iPad. Unfortunately, there is a 4gb file cap, which is a shame because many movie files these days are over 4gb. They did not make this information available anywhere, and only after scouring the answers section can you find this information. I hope this helps anyone trying to use this to watch torrents on their iPads or iphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great way to extend storage on an iPhone or iPad
customer_reviews.text: The HooToo iPhone Flash Drive 256GB added much needed storage to both my iPhone and iPad. Its portability allowed me to carry videos and music without having to use available device storage. Software works seamlessly. The HooToo iPhone Flash Drive 256GB is a must for those who travel. It provides compact storage that is easy to use. My only wish is that the new software would run older HooToo memory sticks.
customer_reviews.author: R. Szabo

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the second iphone USB drive I bought during last three month. The first one I bought had USB and iphone connection which can slide out. It worked very well and was so convenient that my daughter took it away. So I bought this one and I love it. It is solid one piece wrapped by stainless steel, which can last very long. And it has tiny loop can hook up with my car key, so I wouldn't lost it.
customer_reviews.author: datou

customer_reviews.title: 100 STARS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 100 stars!!!! This usb works great and is EXACTLY what I was looking for. I have thousands of pictures on my phone from my kids, pets, friends, screenshots, memes, and so on and so on (you get the point). Using this USB I was able to create a folder on the device, go through my pics and select all that applies to each folder. Then I would transfer each folder that I created on to the normal/smaller gb usbs and then delete the folder from this device. It’s quick. It’s easy to use. You can’t beat the price. I am a very happy customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: People that need more storage need this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is really helpful especially for me. I have a phone with only 32 gb which my friend got for me and I love taking pictures. Therefore, I had to buy this which is extremely beneficial for me I love that I can easily close it without losing the cap for me. There is an app that needs to be installed for this flash drive. It was easy to use and I will have to buy another pair with more storage capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: Now i do not have to go looking for an adapter to download my Photos.. .Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Seabee

customer_reviews.title: Does Exactly What I Needed It To Do
customer_reviews.text: I travel for long periods of time--often without access to reliable WiFi--and my iPad Pro didn't have enough space to load several seasons of TV shows onto it. But this little guy solved my problem. I watch classics that I rip from DVD so I just copied them from my desktop onto the HooToo. After installing the iPlugmate app on my iPad (from iTunes), I just plugged the drive in and was immediately able to access and watch shows through the app. Perfect! I've been using it for a few months now and have had no issues at all. My only minor complaint (and maybe I just can't find a setting to disable it) is the auto play next feature.
customer_reviews.author: B. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Holds tons of storage, frees up my Ipad
customer_reviews.text: It accomplished what I needed it for, storing tons of photos, videos so I could free up space on my IPad. I was able to download a lot of videos that i could only access through a Windows platform and wanted to transfer it to be able to watch on my iPad. Perfect. The only downside was I had to be careful of the size of downloads. I have videos that are greater than 4 GB. Wish I could have gotten those on as well. I like the storage box it comes in, nice to keep and not lose the flash drive.
customer_reviews.author: Tomlyn

customer_reviews.title: Small lightweight size to put on a key ring!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great key ring companion, about the size of a house key, to always have on hand if you need to backup files, pics or photos from your Apple product. It is very easy to use with a lightening adapter on one end and usb on the other. I used this a lot on a long weekend vacation. It has an ample size of storage to move things from phone or IPad to computer. I think it’s a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Awkward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flash drive!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a flash drive for my cell phone because I make a lot of videos about my workouts and food recipes, I bought this item and it had worked excellet, its to easy to use and intall in your phone. You can choose the videos or pictures that you need to save in it and you can move to your laptop or keep them in the flash drive. Also, the price is to good for the capacity, 128GB, 5 starts👌
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: it's worthless for video and image transfer
customer_reviews.text: After doing a small test to confirm the transfer had worked I realized all my video and even the still images transfered from my Iphone 10 to the HOO TOO needed to be reformatted or something... this is ridiculous. I'm sending this back for refund. The only reason I bought this was to handle large files of video and images that had piled up on my I phone. Why else would anyone need so much storage? If this item wasn't able to handle smooth and effortless transfer of video for the Iphone 10 it should not be available. This was a total failure. I lost images and a few video for ever.
customer_reviews.author: scott tucker

customer_reviews.title: Amending my previous review
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working after a few months. After posting my previous review their customer service reached out to me and asked me if I wanted a refund or a replacement. I Asked for a replacement bc I do still need one and while my old one worked it worked very well. The lady also explained that they made updates so that it works with the new iOS. I received it today and it works perfect! I love it. I give it 3 out of four bc it’s the other worked for about 3 months so I will have to wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Martinez

customer_reviews.title: BooHOO to HooToo!
customer_reviews.text: The External drive is not seen by the app. The HooToo not seen by my new Dell laptop either... app see all pictures on the phone but will not transfer any selected to the HooToo! Don't trust this product!
customer_reviews.author: mikeg

customer_reviews.title: IPhone Flash Drive
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! I needed something to get all the pics of my kids off my phone easily and this was it. You do need to download the app, but that was simple enough. The only downside would be some of the phones I took off my phone and put on the flash drive would not open on my or In-Laws (who I was sharing the pics with) computer unless I had a specific add on or paid for some program. Overall, extremely happy with this nifty little device and will probably be getting it for others as it is a great way to save all those precious memories.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Palino

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flash drive (128GB) so that I could backup my photos and videos from my iPhone and not have to pay for apple cloud service. It's looks nice and it's very light weight, easy to carry around. Just download app from app store and backup the files to the drive. There are some restriction on the type of file that can be backed up. I use it mainly for photos and videos, so it's a non issue for me. I use it to copy the files from my iPhone to my MacBook pro as well. Overall a good and useful product.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Very handy photo and file management device
customer_reviews.text: This is my second, higher capacity HooToo flash drive. These things are great tools for off-loading (or on-loading photo or video files on your iPhone (or iPad), without having to connect to iTunes. It takes awhile to understand the best way to manage your files, but when you figure it out, it helps you save a lot of time to edit (save, remove or delete) your iPhone photos, or do a quick and easy backup. Also, I backed up all the documents from my MacBook onto the flash drive. I now can access the files easily from my iPhone or iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Goodell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Now, I can back up my photos, videos or documents from cell to this tiny drive and not worry about low phone storage. The files can be shared to a computer without having to plug in the phone to computer. I transferred all the thousands of my cellphone pictures to this USB! It’s a very practical device and easy to use. Its adaptable with all cellphones. 128 gigabytes is unheard of! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great plug it in to your iPhone or iPad it shows you the software you need to download you're up and running it back up your whole phone and I would ask if you would like to delete any items that are just backed up you have the choice to delete whatever. It backs up your songs the app to be a little bit better for that . You have to copy your songs and then move them to the folder that you want on your flash drive. But it's really easy to do. Frees up space on your phone or iPad.
customer_reviews.author: D. Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t accomplish what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The product and software work easily, but the iPhone didn’t get anymore memory space. Don’t know if it’s a Apple design problem or not.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stampley

customer_reviews.title: Very good little flash drive
customer_reviews.text: Very good little flash drive. Very robust feeling. I give it 4 stars due to the lightning plug cap which is a nice feature but it fits loose. If not for the ring that secures it to the flash drive, it would be lost quickly. It keeps coming off the plug so I have started carrying the drive in the nice little box that it came in. Very nice packaging. The aluminum body is nice and makes it more professional looking and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T

customer_reviews.title: THE BEES KNEES
customer_reviews.text: Well it all started with a glitchy iphone, and thats how i ended up here. My PC’s would not and still won’t recognize my phone. Needless to say i had 600 pics of my twin grandsons that i couldnt remove. Read a few bad reviews but still looked like the best candidate for the job. May be writing this to soon because im overjoyed at getting all the pics off my phone. But I’ll tell ya i couldnt be more happier than i am right now. It will allow me to get a lot more than just pics (BONUS).
customer_reviews.author: Dave Marsh

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY if you have an ipad
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY if you have an ipad becuasee with iPad OS, the majority of the storage problems are gone, it is USB 2, but so is my iPad. The Lightning side is USELESS AND SHOULDN'T be used. The other side it amazingly thanks to Apple. Move things (somewhat) fast between and Mac or Ipad. I even reformatted it AFS. (The new Apple File System) as my iPad and macbook read it.
customer_reviews.author: JR Morris

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Portable
customer_reviews.text: This flash drive is very useful and convenient. It comes with two ends, could be used for both the USB end and the lightning end. It is great for my MacBook. The color is really nice, it matches my space grey Macbook. The storage space is big and it's just so easy to switch between two different ends. I love the design and the compatibility. Great product overall!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey She

customer_reviews.title: files are now one!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i own several of these. i loved it at first but this latest one just one day decided not to open on the app nor the computer. It didnt get wet or anything so not sure i dont know it malfunctioned and now my files are gone!!!!now i dont trust this device. better back up your device with other device before u regret and lose all your files. i'm so upset!!
customer_reviews.author: Imurbburmyhoney

customer_reviews.title: A great flash drive, with a very small room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I think that the function, and amount of space are fantastic. I mean, the 256g for me was fine, and the read / write is totally fine. The versatility to use either the lightning connection, or USB 3 is a Godsend I think it could use a little refresh on the interface, make it a little more user friendly, but it still rates 4 stars! I see now that there is a new model, maybe there are updates on that?
customer_reviews.author: RossB

customer_reviews.title: ****UPDATE***
customer_reviews.text: All I can say st the point is that my wife has been working at transferring her files from her phone to this flash drive for 4 days now and is not having an easy time of it! **UPDATE** The seller reached out to me and advised me that they have changed manufacturers as a result of issues with the brand we received and refunded the cost of the item. I am giving 4 stars for the great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Marianne E

customer_reviews.title: Update Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money...after using only for 1 week the drive is completely dead. It will not load files from phone and I have tried it on 3 different computers that it used to connect to and now it does not show up as a drive. Update, this seller contacted me and offered to give me my money back if I would take down my review. So glad I did not rush on to take down by review because they never refunded my money...so stay away they are not to be trusted and they are selling a junk product that only shows up as a recommendation because they are manipulating the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Adam Cissna

customer_reviews.title: Transfers and Stores FIles Well
customer_reviews.text: This product works as well as advertised. Once I realized that I had to first select "Multiselect" in the upper right part of the screen, the transfer process became a breeze. This device allows one to easily move files from their computer to an iphone or iPad (newer model with lightning connector) and vice versa. The only negative is that with most file transfer software, I could not transfer the playlist directly and keep the info in tact.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: One kink, works well
customer_reviews.text: My first drive was semi-defective: it would read as a USB drive but not as a lightning drive. I contacted HooToo and they quickly replaced it. The new one works as it should. It's very durable -- however, it gets very hot very quickly, which concerns me about storing anything important on it (if it overheats and fries, my data is toast). However, I've had no issues like this with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: the finer things✨🕶

customer_reviews.title: Good product, streams well for video on my iPad ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, streams well for video on my iPad which is the reason I bought it. Two things to take note of though: 1) If you format the file system it's important that it's formatted so there are not partitions under the GUID (basically has to look like a single partition out of the gate) - if not, nothing will show up via the App 2) Has a tough time streaming 1080p videos (and why would you on your iPad?) so good idea to convert them to be smaller standard def, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Copadosion

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. I've cleared photos off of 3 old iphones. It's simple to use, plug into your phone and push a couple buttons.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: I LIKEY!
customer_reviews.text: Finally there is a way to get my music from the PC to the iPhone very easily. The attached cap is a great feature. The metal is substantial, not flimsy. I have not yet tried to group the music by genre, etc. but I hope it can be done, and done easily. Up to this point, I am just happy to have my favorite music available on my phone. Thanks for a great product that works!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY! The ONLY iOS flash drive that works both ways and NO missing files!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 others and was extremely disappointed. I was trying to transfer workout videos from my pc to the flash drive so that I could plug it into my phone or ipad and do workouts when I travel. Some of the files wouldn't copy or transfer correctly to the drive, no matter how many times and the different methods I tried. This was WORTH the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna L

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to avoid software so used this with Apple USB 3 Camera Adapter and lightning AC cable. Downloading photos, which is all I'll do, is super fast though they're not categorized this way. I use a couple of Canon cameras for regular photography so my iPhone 11 is mostly for fun. This does the job, and I like the physical quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Does not format to FAT32 for Tesla Sentry Mode & Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and are buying this to use in your tesla for sentry mode and dash cam it will not be recognized. I have bought 2 separate ones (no exaggeration) on amazon and ran them through multiple formatting utilities only for the car to continually not recognize it as being in the right format. I know the formatting utilities work because they were successfully able to format three other usb drives to FAT32 and the tesla was able to recognize and record videos to it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I like the product is in silver color. It is also protected with password and using Touch ID its super fast. Sometimes it takes time to load the password screen but its rare. The storage is super fast I can transfer pictures and videos super fast from phone to laptop. With usb 3.0, its 128gb which is big for photos and videos. Sometimes it gets hot if you transfer larger files. You can still touch it, but holding long time its noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Harsh

customer_reviews.title: So glad i ordered this item because as an iphone user ...
customer_reviews.text: So glad i ordered this item because as an iphone user and anyone who has an iphone you all know the struggle of not enough space. Now i can easily hook it up to my phone and transfer pictures and files and either carry it around or store it safely somewhere, including on the computer. It's very small and compact and the design is neat. The package it came in was really nice, small black box with foam inserts for the item so it wouldn't get bumped around during shipping. I like that it's steel and not plastic, seems more durable than others i've had before. I would definitely recommend this item to anyone with an Iphone!
customer_reviews.author: Tam Nguyen

product_meta.title: iPhone Flash Drive 128GB HooToo USB 3.0 Photo Stick MFi Certified External Memory Stick, Compatible with iPhone iPad, Touch ID Encryption with iPlugmate App software support Windows Mac and iOS
product_meta.description:
Size:128GBPlug and Play 
- Just plug in HooToo iPhone flash drive to start moving photos and videos off your iPhone. 
- Automatically back up your latest photos and videos every time you plug in HooToo. 
Setup automatic backup within app settings. Delete the local data after backup are supported. 
- Use the in-app camera to save photos and videos directly to HooToo so you can free up your phone's memory for other things. 
-Transfer files between your iPhone iPad and laptop

Data Encryption
Plug HooToo iPhone flash drive to set up password and Touch ID encryption to get photos and videos off your iPhone iPad and keep them save. HooToo iPhone flash drive will be invisible without turn off touch ID encryption. 

Transfer Speed with USB 3.0 and MFi Certified connector
USB 3.0 - Read up to 80 MB/s, Write up to 40 MB/s
MFi connector- Read up to 30 MB/s, Write up to 12 MB/s

Intuitive Design, Premium Build
Full aluminum alloy design
Extra-long 4mm connector for ultimate case compatibility. 

Media Formats Supported
Image: bmp, gif, jpg, tif, png
Music: aac, aiff, caf, mp3, wav
Video: avi, divx, flv, m4v, mkv, mov, mp4, mpg, rm, rmvb, ts, vob, wmv, 3gp
Document: doc, docx, ppt, pptx, xls, xlsx, key, numbers, pages, pdf, html, txt, rtf
Device Support: (iOS 7.1 or higher) iPhone X XR XS 8 8S 7 7S 6 6S 5 5c 5s, iPad Air, iPad mini, iPad mini 4, iPad Pro, iPad

Please Note: 
• You cannot transfer or watch media files downloaded from iTunes or other 3rd party apps, as these files are DRM (Digital Rights Management) protected. 
• With Extra-long 4mm connector you don’t need to remove most iPhone case except OtterBox, LifeProof or other thick iPhone case. 
• Instruction PDF is in flash drive. 
• Touch ID encryption must turned off when connect to laptop or the flash drive can’t be recognized.
feature_bullets: iPhone Flash Drive 128GB MFI Certified USB 3.0: 128GB storage MFI Certified by Official Approved
iPhone Photo Stick: Simply moving photos and videos from your iPhone to flash drive
Secure Data Encryption Technology: Touch ID Encryption and Password. The Video and Photo in your iPhone must be decrypted before visible on PC. HooToo Sincerely protect our customer privacy.
Aluminum Design & USB 3.0 Extend 4mm Connector: Enjoy durable and superior protection with the full aluminum alloy design and Up to 80 Mb/S reading and 30 Mb/S writing speed.

Format-Friendly iPlugmate App & 18 Months Warranty: Own Development iPlugmate software can support videos formats: AVI, M4V, MKV, MOV, M P4, MPG, RM, RMVB, TS, WMV, FLV, 3GP; AUDIOS: FLAC, APE, AAC, AIF, M4A, MP3, WAV. HooToo provide 18 months Customer service warranty.
